QuestData.Title: The Chamber of Khaz'mul
QuestData.Description: In the Map Chamber there is a locked door which I believe leads to the legendary Chamber of Khaz'mul. We do not yet know what artifacts wait inside it.$B$B$B$BWhat we do know is that it is guarded by Ironaya, a Titanic Watcher of immense size and power. You'll need to defeat her if you intend to progress any further into this place.
QuestData.RewardText: Reliquary agents are en route to investigate the chamber. You have more important matters to attend to.
